name: Shapeshift Ice Hockey
description:
ShapeShift Ice Hockey

How to play :

Controls : ASDF

Use Left Shift to shapeshift into a powerful bear

Right click to attack or if you have the puck, shoot (aim with mouse pointer)

Press Q or E to cycle between your players when you

are not in control of the puck.

Scroll Up and Down to Zoom in and out

Have fun !
